headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RUVINSKY, JOAN FAHNESTOCK

snippet: RUVINSKY--Joan Fahnestock, 72, passed away peacefully and gracefully on March 21 at 12:30pm in Montreal, bathed in light and surrounded by sangha. A yoga teacher with an international following, Joan is survived by her daughter, Jessica Ruvinsky; by her partner, Kathleen Knipp; and by her half-sister, Patricia Locke Munger. A memorial service will be held on Sunday, April 10 at 3pm at the Unitarian Church of Montreal, 5035 Boulevard de Maisonneuve Ouest. 1/3
